overview:
Steve is an expert in developing scalable enterprise software solutions and leads the best team in the industry at Hearsay Social.

Before founding Hearsay Social, Mr. Garrity worked as a Program Manager and engineer at Microsoft Corporation in Seattle where he developed the Azure.net services platform and worked as a Product Manager at Fortify Software.

He is a graduate of Stanford University with a BS and MS in Computer Science. At Stanford, he was a Mayfield Fellow while studying Computer Science.
